reviewText: Excellent series. Never get tired of rewatching them. I would love to access DVD's, not made yet. The VHS tapes are in excellent condition. Would recommend this series to any nature lover. The range of terrain and presentation is superb.

John Sparks' and Nikolai Drozdov's highly acclaimed documentary on the spectacular nature of Russia and neighboring countries that constitute the former Soviet Union. I regret and frankly don't understand why it hasn't been (yet?) released on DVD
